post.body: I really appreciate Team In Training and they are miles ahead of us @ this time.
If you ever want to do a tri to raise money for pediatric cancer, we can set you up with a cool kit. Just let me know
get a chance to watch our video from our '08 challenge? BTW - Thanks for the love!!!
I see we speak the same Tribal language of the Way :-)
There's a famous man of antiquity that gave the same 2 or more challenge and He inspires me daily to live that one out.
discovering their potentials so they can live them out.
As a psychotherapist I get very frustrated with my field as it seems way to bent on pathologizing, rather than reframing and...
Cheers back @ ya!
I have found them to be deep souls trapped in a culture who misunderstands them. They're created to live outside the box!
Have a fantastic workout mate. Me trying to be Aussie, my best attempt.
Life's too short to just tweet it away, so might as well join forces with like-minded tweets like yourself.
Need to know how to pull that script thing off as my time is minimal.
many of the people I work with are bipolar, and they are some of the most creative and empathetic people alive!!! Great TwitGroup
Seems like you have a pretty good system of keeping your ratio solid.
Good evening, morning, or whatever it is over there... anyways, I hope it is going well.
sorry, I'm just passionate about the message and my tweets get a little long-winded... please forgive
only "no" follow survivors are those very close to Sir Lance and LiveStrong as I need to know the pulse of what they're up to.
As Napoleon Dynamite would say, "Flippin' Sweet!"
great insight!!!
What's his name??? I'm tied into the Chiro world as I'm a more holistic type and utilize chiropractors often.
Her homestead is 40 min. from my frontdoor. Vacaville is a great area. Sent you a DM. Will be available Mon. early PM.
Would really love to as PEDIATRIC CANCER is underrepresented in cancer treatment, research and care. DM'n contact info
I'm in a suburb of Sacramento call Fair Oaks. Best cycling area in Cali.
I'm a Marriage & Family Therapist by vocation, but philanthropic fitness is my passion via "Team Will" & cycling4kids.com
let's definitely connect!!!
follow @livestrongceo and try to connect. Sounds like a fantastic idea.
I'm not connected to Livestrong. I'm part of "Team Will" cycling. Our focus is in the specific area of pediatric cancer...
absultely enjoy Willard. One of the great mind and souls of our generation... from my perspective.
I have noticed that charities on FaceBook don't raise much money. Worth a try though.
I agree and I look forward to it.
is improving his twitter "follow". Common folk still not part of the picture it seems.
great quote. Huge C.S. Lewis fan!
Bad karma going down. Since I posted my hatchet comments I have lost 2 followers. Didn't mean to insult anyone.
wow my last tweet didn't exemplify any form of sane English.
thank you to all followers, I have enjoyed your tweets and have been inspired by many of your them as I've watched them go by ;-)
short week, wonderful clients, great way to close out '08.
Coffee's a brewin', pelletstove is a roarin' & and I'm wishing y'all the best of Monday mornings.
I just took the lead from 7 time TDF winner, Lance Armstrong. 491 updates for Lance. Drop-in Lance, I'll pull for a bit.
I'm often stunned at the quality of people I meet via Twitter. Thank you all and let's continue to tweet towards a better world.
Here at HQ, we're watching Brian Regan, "The Epitome of Hyperbole,"...gasping for breath due to extensive laughter convulsions!
